sense.def:
An organization
je skupina ljudi, ki nekaj redno delajo skupaj v organizirani obliki. Organizacije so na primer podjetja in klubi.

The organization of a system
je način, kako so različni deli sistema povezani in kako delujejo kot celota.

seg.quote: There has been a total change in the organization of society.

sense.def:
The organization of an activity or public event
so vse priprave na neko dejavnost ali prireditev.

seg.quote: I don't want to get involved in the actual organisation of things.
